name: Aman Pratap Singh
summary:
Full Stack Developer with 2.8 years of experience delivering production-grade web platforms. Proven
expertise in designing async REST APIs using FastAPI and Flask, optimizing PostgreSQL databases, and
containerizing services with Docker for cloud-native deployments. Experienced in integrating AWS services
(S3), building real-time background tasks using Celery and asyncio, and deploying pipelines using GitHub
Actions on GCP. Strong focus on clean architecture, measurable performance improvements, and
cross-functional collaboration.
KEY COMPETENCIES / TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages & Frameworks: C++, Python Django, FastAPI, JavaScrip, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, Next.js.

description: Developed and scaled 80+ RESTful APIs across accounting modules like invoicing, ledgers, GST,
reports, audits, and balance sheets using FastAPI and PostgreSQL.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, Docker, and shell scripting for efficient and consistent
deployments.
Built reusable backend workflows for reporting, language support, dashboards, and invoice data
processing.
Boosted performance by 40% via async APIs, DB indexing, and response optimization.
Reduced reporting lag by 60% by modularizing logic and improving data streaming.
Developed over 30+ secure RESTful APIs using Python and MSSQL, integrating robust authentication
(JWT/OAuth2) and encryption protocols for data security.
Optimized backend logic and query performance, achieving a 10% reduction in API response time
through code refactoring and MSSQL tuning.
Engineered scalable solutions for the Safeobuddy platform, improving UX and increasing traffic by 15%
through better API structuring and frontend-backend synergy.
Delivered 92% production-ready code within Agile sprints, meeting tight deadlines and supporting
global clients like Amazon, Flipkart, and Dart (USA, Kenya).
